name: Black Zork
description: A super fun map treasure hunt game, are you sure you won't come and experience it? In this yellow land, there are many legends waiting for you to reveal. With simple operations, control the movement direction of the yellow small square person to ensure that it is always on the map grid, and try to pick up coins or crystals as much as possible to obtain higher scores. There is a display of game time and scores in the upper left corner of the game, and a preview of the map in the upper right corner. Come and give it a try!
